metadata.name: Curse experiment
metadata.description:
A version of [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1125511770] Reversible Curses [/url] that is updated to work with Repentance.
[h1] Original Description: [/h1] Small mod that lets you remove some curses through ingame actions.
I Can See Forever! pill will now remove Curse of the Lost and Curse of the Blind from the floor.
The Sun will now remove Curse of the Lost and Curse of Darkness from the floor.
The World will now remove Curse of the Lost from the floor.
Ansuz will now remove Curse of the Lost and Curse of the Blind from the floor.
The Compass, Treasure Map, Blue Map, and The Mind will remove Curse of the Lost when you enter a new floor/room, every cache update, and when you use any pills, cards, or items (even modded ones!).
Night Light will now remove Curse of Darkness. Inspired by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1388197341]this mod[/url].
Black Candle is now more effective at removing curses, removing them every time you enter a new floor/room, every cache update, and when you use any pills, cards, or items (even modded ones!).
